en.title: Professional Experience
en.description: My professional experience since graduating university.

en.title: Software Engineer
en.description: I led the development of a highly scalable second-screen application, boosting its elasticity by 350%, enabling it to scale from 0 to 42K concurrent connections in just one minute. I also reduced operational costs by 40% through right-sizing and efficient caching. As a backend engineer, I contributed to a VOD solution for Deutsche Bahn’s high-speed trains, developed deployment tools for software updates across 80 trains, and improved an ad-tech solution, cutting error rates and saving ~600K€ annually.

en.title: Director of Engineering
en.description: I led ProSiebenSat.1’s Content Services Engineering division, delivering video-on-demand to 20M+ MAU through a distributed, event-driven architecture with 50+ microservices. I drove significant improvements, reducing latency by 82%, speeding up deployments from monthly to daily, and reengineering the B2B content syndication pipeline. As part of the core engineering team, I helped launch Joyn in 9 months, scaled the division to 45+ FTEs, and delivered an AWS migration ahead of schedule and under budget.

en.title: Senior Solutions Architect
en.description: I design and optimize high-scale cloud architectures, handling millions of transactions and petabyte-scale data across global, multi-region deployments. With expertise in distributed systems and event-driven architectures, I’ve built platforms for 30k+ users and mentored team members who earned promotions. I’ve contributed to major open-source projects, published over 15 technical papers, and regularly speak at tier-1 tech conferences.
